name: WOVER
description:
WOVER is an A.I. platform that empowers individuals to deal effectively with personal emergencies, save lives and enjoy peace of mind.
WOVER helps:
1. minimize the impact of emergencies by enabling faster response,
2. or even detect potential emergency situations and warn individuals about them.
